scripts.demo: npm run build-browser && echo 'Visit http://localhost:3000/demo' && serve
scripts.build-browser: rm -rf build && webpack lib/angular-barcode-io.js build/angular-io-barcode.js && NODE_ENV=production webpack lib/angular-barcode-io.js build/angular-io-barcode.min.js && echo "gzipped, the global build is `gzip -c build/angular-io-barcode.min.js | wc -c` bytes"
